name: Zuchi Dojo
description: The floor of the main hall is covered in hammers. A large scroll with the character for hammer hangs from the far wall.

name: Houchou Dojo
description: The walls of the hall are covered in knives of various sizes. Each member of the dojo stands in line, awaiting their next challenger.

name: Ittou Dojo
description: A single sword sits above the back wall of the dojo. Members line the sides of the hall, sitting with their legs crossed.

name: Ono Dojo
description: You find the halls of this dojo lined with weapons, most of which are axes. A great double-sided axe hangs directly over the dojo master, dangling by a thread.

name: Tsuyo Dojo
description: The hall looks more like a gym than a dojo hall. There are weights and workout stations strewn about haphazardly. A very large man stands in the center of the room lifting weights.

name: Nittou Dojo
description: A pair of swords stand crossed at the back of the dojo. Everyone in the dojo is wielding at least two swords. They all look very strong.
